Control Name: SA-9 (2) IDENTIFICATION OF FUNCTIONS / PORTS / PROTOCOLS / SERVICES
Control Statement: The organization requires providers of [Assignment: organization-defined external information system services] to identify the functions, ports, protocols, and other services required for the use of such services.
